name: Seal
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Hold Breath: The seal can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
traits.Keen Smell: The seal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +2+1d4 + 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
